20-012EC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Ethics Commission Special Meetings of Thursday, March 12, and Friday, March 13, 2020.Commissioner Pollack spoke.Amy Webber, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.A motion was made by Vice Chair Morales, seconded by Commissioner Shotwell, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Lani De Benedictis, Luke Fiedler, Kimmy Maniquis, J. P. Shotwell, Margo Morales and Susan WiseAbstain: 1 - Barbara Pollack2.

20-013EC.summary: Recommendation to hold an election for the position of Chair and Vice Chair of the Ethics Commission.Chair Wise spoke.Amy Webber, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.Chair Wise declared the nominations open for Chair.Vice Chair Morales nominated Chair Wise for Chair of the Ethics Commission.There being no further nominations, Chair Wise declared the nominations closed for Chair.Chair Wise spoke.Page 2 of 9TELECONFERENCE, 2:00 PMWEDNESDAY, JULY 15, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHETHICS COMMISSION MINUTESA motion was made by Vice Chair Morales, to approve recommendation to nominate Chair Wise for Chair of the Ethics Commission.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Lani De Benedictis, Luke Fiedler, Kimmy Maniquis, Barbara Pollack, J. P. Shotwell, Margo Morales and Susan WiseChair Wise declared the nominations open for Vice Chair.Commissioner Maniquis nominated Vice Chair Morales for Vice Chair of the Ethics Commission.There being no further nominations, Chair Wise declared the nominations closed for Vice Chair.Vice Chair Morales spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Maniquis, to approve recommendation and nominate Vice Chair Morales for Vice Chair of the Ethics Commission.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Lani De Benedictis, Luke Fiedler, Kimmy Maniquis, Barbara Pollack, J. P. Shotwell, Margo Morales and Susan Wise3.

20-014EC.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a report on the powers and duties of the Ethics Commission, as prescribed in Measure CCC.Rebecca Garner, Administrative Deputy City Manager, presented a PowerPoint presentation.Commissioner Pollack spoke.Rebecca Garner, Administrative Deputy City Manager, spoke.Chair Wise spoke.Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Wise and Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst.Page 3 of 9TELECONFERENCE, 2:00 PMWEDNESDAY, JULY 15, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHETHICS COMMISSION MINUTESCommissioner Maniquis spoke.Commissioner Pollack spoke.Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst, spoke.Chair Wise spoke.Commissioner Shotwell spoke.Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Shotwell and Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Analyst.Chair Wise spoke.Commissioner De Benedictis spoke.A motion was made by Vice Chair Morales, seconded by Commissioner De Benedictis, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Lani De Benedictis, Luke Fiedler, Kimmy Maniquis, Barbara Pollack, J. P. Shotwell, Margo Morales and Susan Wise4.

The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Lani De Benedictis, Luke Fiedler, Kimmy Maniquis, Barbara Pollack, J. P. Shotwell, Margo Morales and Susan Wise5.
